old: すべての行く末
new: The Fate of All

old:
メルゴダの深淵の空に現れた暗黒の世界と
レスタニアを繋ぐ滅びの渦へ入り黒竜を倒す
new:
Enter the Vortex of Stagnation that connects the 
dark world that appeared in skies of 
Mergoda Abyss and Lestania, 
and slay the black dragon.

old: ジョゼフと話す
new: Speak with Joseph

old: クラウスと話す
new: Speak with Klaus

old: 滅びの渦が観察できるザンドラ禁域へ向かう
new:
Head towards the Zandora Wastelands where the 
Vortex of Stagnation can be observed.

old: 亡都メルゴダのテオドールの元へ向かう
new: Head to Theodor in the Mergoda Ruins

old: 亡都メルゴダ王宮層入口へ向かい黒剣を探す
new:
Head towards the entrance to the 
Mergoda Ruins: Royal Palace Level 
and search for the Black Sword.

old: 魔物を倒し黒剣を破壊する
new: Defeat the enemy and destroy the Black Sword.

old: ベアトリクスと話す
new: Speak with Beatrix

old: 次の場所へ向かい黒剣を探す
new:
Head towards the next location and search 
for the Black Sword.

old: 魔物を倒し黒剣を破壊する
new: Defeat the enemy and destroy the Black Sword.

old: テオドールと話す
new: Speak with Theodor

old: メルゴダ護政区前で待つリズ達の元へ向かう
new:
Head to Lise and the others waiting in front of 
the Mergoda Security District.

old: 白竜神殿のトラバースの元へ向かう
new: Head to Travers in the White Dragon Temple

old: トラバースから大竜晶破壊戦：捧げられし廃都を受諾してクリアする
new:
Clear 
"The Great Dragon Crystal War: 
The Sacrificed Capital" 
by accepting the challenge from Travers.

old: トラバースに報告する
new: Report to Travers

old: メルゴダ護政区前で待つリズ達と合流する
new: Rendezvous with 待つリズ in front of the Mergoda Security District

old: メルゴダ護政区内に出現したゲートの場所ヘ向かう
new:
Head towards the gate that appeared in the 
Mergoda Security District.

old: 遭遇した魔物を倒す
new: Defeat the encountered demons
